data.name: Dragomon Hunter - Welcome Gift
data.detailed_description:
To activate your gift:
  • Go to our Gift Redemption page HERE
  • Log in with your Aeria Account (not Steam account!)
  • Enter your DLC Key
  • Click on the green Redeem button
  • Log into Dragomon Hunter
  • Once in game, open the Item Mall (default hotkey: I)
  • Click on the "Get All" button in the bottom right corner of the Item Mall window

This free DLC will help you to become an effective hunter in no time! It includes all of the following items:
  • Kitty Headband
  • Rock Gigant's Whistle
  • 3-Star Evolution Gem (Bound)
  • 5x Regen Potion (Bound)
  • 3x Battlefield HP Elixir (Bound)
  • 3x EXP Badge (Bound)
  • 3x Quest EXP Badge (Bound)

About Dragomon Hunter

Dragomon Hunter is a thrilling, vibrant anime-style MMORPG for adventure seekers everywhere! Gather your friends and travel across a huge world to track down and defeat over 100 exclusive Dragomon. Master hunters will be rewarded with glory and power: conquer Dragomon and add them to your stable of mounts, or harvest materials from them to upgrade your gear.

A true hunter utilizes strategy as well as strength. Observe your prey, determine their weaknesses, and use the most effective weapons and traps to bring them down. Play as one of four classes and customize your abilities for the greatest chance of success. Join a party of fellow hunters to vanquish the most dangerous Dragomon!

FEATURES:
  • Hunt over 100 species of Dragomon
  • Ride defeated Dragomon as mounts
  • Upgrade your gear with materials gathered from defeated prey
  • Choose from four playable classes: Scout, Mercenary, Mage, and Cleric
  • Team up with friends to tackle the strongest enemies in Co-Op mode
  • Play with the original Japanese voice-over featuring actors from world-famous anime series
  • Play with a controller as an alternative to keyboard and mouse controls
  • Enjoy a beautiful world brought to life with a vivid anime art style

data.short_description: Free Welcome Gift for all our players coming from Steam!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / Win7 / Win8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.8 GHz / AMD K8 2600 and higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8400, ATI Radeon HD4570 or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

data.legal_notice: © 2015 Dragomon Hunter is a registered trademark of Aeria Games GmbH in the US and/or other countries.
